name: Makuramon
description: Makuramon is a monkey Digimon with a large head. It wears a purple hat which has a gold plate with bonji on the front and red cloth on the back, a silver cuirass with spaulders, tassets, and gold trim, silver vambraces with gold trim and black gloves, a purple scarf, a purple belt with three gold buckles, tan baggy pants, and black shoes.
